## Gesture.getCurrentDragger() method

Gets the current dragger if an item is being dragged. Null if nothing is being dragged.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurrentDragger(): WorkspaceDragger | BubbleDragger | IBlockDragger | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[WorkspaceDragger](./blockly.workspacedragger_class.md) \| [BubbleDragger](./blockly.bubbledragger_class.md) \| [IBlockDragger](./blockly.iblockdragger_interface.md) \| null

The dragger that is currently in use or null if no drag is in progress.
